title: Jordan Peterson defines Religion
description:
JBP is asked about how he uses the term "religion" by a student. "How you act out your axiomatic assumptions."  That's a pretty good definition. I play it through once and then offer my commentary. 

From Jordan Peterson at Lafayette https://youtu.be/qT_YSPxxFJk
